name: Rad Rodent Racing
description: Take control of the cutest critters in the land on a quest for glory in Rad Rodent Racing. Hop lanes to dodge dastardly leaf piles, and hit max speed to watch your cheeky racer shine brighter than the brightest stars. But watch out for sharp corners or you'll soon be taking a dip with the fishies! Join Peaches, Honeybear, Brotato and more in an adventure you won't soon forget!
